channel.title: Codes on Bio Data Science
channel.description: Recent content in Codes on Bio Data Science

item.description: Breiman ‘two cultures’ Prediction To be able to predict what the responses are going to be to future input variables; Algorithmic modeling culture: the shape of that function(x) of the predictor variables is unknown, and we shouldn’t specify a form. Focus is on model validation by predictive accuracy. Information To extract some information about how nature is associating the response variables to the input variables Data modeling culture: values of parameters are estimated from data, assuming that there is some known function that links predictor and responses, where information is the main goal.
